name: Vegan Lentil Stew
procedure: Chop vegetables and potato into dice. Heat oil in large pot over medium heat. Add onions and cook for about 3 minutes. Add garlic and cook for another minute. Stir in celery, Italian seasoning, paprika, cumin and thyme and cook for 30 seconds. Add lentils, tomatoes, tomato paste, carrots and potatoes, bay leaf and vegetable broth. Bring to boil, reduce heat to simmer for about 40 minutes or until stew has reached the desired texture. Remove bay leaf, season with salt and pepper and serve.
